title: One year on: How Miami GP kicked off McLaren's F1 turnaround
summary: This week Formula 1 returns to Miami, a venue where McLaren began to reap the regards of its transformation into championship contender after years of falling short

qa_pairs.question: Which team experienced a turnaround in performance starting from the Miami Grand Prix?
In which year did the Miami Grand Prix first take place in Formula 1?
What is the primary significance of the Miami Grand Prix for McLaren?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It marked the beginning of their transformation into a championship contender.
wrong_options: It was their first race of the season.
They introduced a new car design.
